name: MOTH HOUSE
description:
MOTH HOUSE - is a collectible horror game that is an adventure game in an old house where many varieties of moths dine, which you will catch. The house is very dark and all you find in your pockets is a box of matches, with which you can light your way a little.

FEATURES:

  • Multiple endings (there are three).
  • 15-25 minute playthrough.
  • Monochrome and VHS effects.
  • 25 types of moths.
  • Notes describing some types of moths.

CONTROLS:

  • LMB - INTERACT
  • MOUSE WHEEL - CHANGE ITEMS
  • SHIFT - RUN
  • CTRL - SNEAK
  • TAB - OPEN BACKPACK
  • F - USE MATCH

CREDITS:

  • PROPS AND FURNITURE by Elbolilloduro
  • SOME TEXTURES by Screaming Brain Studios
  • JAR by SebastianSosnowski
  • GIANT MOTH by Andykk
  • CROWBAR by Thunder
  • SOUNDS from freesound.org
Follow to my twitter for updates
